players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked by Charlie's sudden death. We should all be on high alert and make sure we work together to figure out what happened."

Bob: "I agree with Diana that we should all work together to figure out what happened to Charlie. However, I also think it's important that we remain vigilant and consider the possibility that one of us may be working with the mafia. We need to carefully..."
Diana: "I'm concerned that one of us might be working with the mafia. Let's all take turns sharing our whereabouts during the night to help narrow down the possibilities."
Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share our whereabouts during the night to help us determine who might have been involved in Charlie's death. I was in my house the entire time."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
